Lyrics: Love him like I do [x8]
[Ruben Studdard:]
Giving honor to you first
The pastor of the church
My folks and friends
Listen to these words
See God save me (yeah)
From myself when no one else was around
And it was only by His grace
His mercy His favor
Cause I know I don't deserve
All the love he show (oh)
And how he let me know (oh)
He never gonna leave my side
[Chorus:]
That's why I love him like I do, I
I Love him like I do, I
That's why I love him like I do, I
I, I [x2]
[Deitrick Haddon:]
See I got a testimony how He save my soul
When I was just a sinner left in the cold
Gave me a second chance
Saved me from myself
Came to my rescue
When I needed help
You want to know why, I love him like I do
Cause when my enemies said I was through
He took me from the bottom
And put me on the top
He laid his hands on me
And now I can't be stopped
[Chorus:]
That's why I love him like I do, I
I Love him like I do, I
That's why I love him like I do, I
I, I [x2]
[Mary Mary:]
Somebody told me that we overcome by our testimony
Bet you wouldn't believe how doubt and fear used to paralyze me
But God's hand led me through the test
And he brought out the very best of me
And now I'll never forget
To tell the world what You mean to me
[Chorus:]
That's why I love him like I do, I
I Love him like I do, I
That's why I love him like I do, I
I, I [x2]
Lyric.Title: Deitrick Haddon – Love Him Like I Do Lyrics | Genius Lyrics

Lyrics: [Intro: Michael Jackson]
A buh-buh buh buh

Lyrics: Baby, when I'm wrapped up in your arms
It never rains

That we got love, you got me
If I got you, baby, we got more than money
You are everything a man's been dreamin' of

And you know I love to see you smile, oh
And what you done for me
What you done for me makes it all worthwhile, oh, baby
'Cause you, you are my desire

With the slightest touch my soul's on fire
'Cause we got love, baby, you got me
And if I got you we got more than money
You are everything a man's been dreamin' of
Oh, we got love, baby, we got love
Storms are gonna rise and winds are gonna blow

You are everything a man's been dreamin' of

Yeah, yeah, love, baby, we got love
I, I know we gotta, gotta, got, got love

Baby, we got, we got love
Oh, love, oh, love

Lyrics: I love how your eyes close whenever you kiss me

I love how you think of me without being told to
I love the way your touch is always heavenly
But, darling, most of all I love how you love me
(I love how you love me)
I love how your eyes close whenever you kiss me
And when I'm away from you I love how you miss me
I love the way your touch is always heavenly
But, darling, most of all I love how you love me
(I love how you love me)
I love how you hug me (I love how you hug me)
I love how you squeeze me, tease me, please me
Love, how you love me
I love how you love me

Lyrics: [Verse 1:]
I was messed up, dirty as I could be
I was on my way to hell;
But I heard the preacher
Preaching the Word of God
Confess your sins and repent
[Chorus:]
I came to Jesus as I was
Weary, worn, and sad
I found in Him a resting place
And He has made, made me glad
[Verse 2:]
I asked the Lord
"how could He love me
I have sinned against Your will"
But He said, "repent and I will forgive you
The question's who will you serve?"
[Verse 3:]
You might be dirty, messed up inside
You may even have lost your will to live;
Don't be discouraged, don't throw in the towel
Confess your sins and repent so you can be like me
[Vamp 1:]
Weary
[Vamp 2:]
Jesus
Lyric.Title: New Direction – I Came To Jesus Lyrics | Genius Lyrics

Lyrics: [Verse 1]
Life can be so fair
Let it go on and on
I can push for good
You got that cherry bomb
[Chorus]
Blow out that cherry bomb for me
We lost it long ago
You and me
[Verse 2]
Now you know your way
Back from the spirit bar
Brush your teeth for bed
Blow out that cherry bomb

Blow out that cherry bomb for me
You got to know it's on your sleeve
Know it's on your sleeve
Know it's on your sleeve (Come on, come on)
[Bridge]
It was the longest day that I'd ever known
I watched you start that drive alone

Blow out that cherry bomb for me
It's going to burn right up your sleeve

[Verse 3]
So there you go again
Out in your dressing gown
Get yourself to bed
Blow out that cherry bomb
[Outro]

I could pay to that hand on your cherry bomb

I could pay to that hand on your cherry bomb
